thread.title: Steak ‘n Shake: Kids Eat FREE All Day EVERYDAY
thread.title_full: Steak ‘n Shake: Kids Eat FREE All Day EVERYDAY

author: Erica (Silly Sidekick)
title: Steak ‘n Shake: Kids Eat FREE All Day EVERYDAY
text:
Wow! This is great news! If you have a Steak ‘n Shake nearby, you may be interested to know that they recently announced on their Facebook Page that Kids Eat FREE All Day EVERYDAY with $9 spent on an adult meal! How cool is that? Please note that this is at participating locations only, so be sure to call your location ahead of time to make sure they are participating before heading out.
(Thanks, Freebies for a Cause !)
